domain

Class CardExchangeViewModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • domain.CardExchangeViewModel

  • public class CardExchangeViewModel
extends java.util.Observable
    This class represent model class for Card Exchange View Model.
    Author:
    Shivam

      • setIfPlayerGetsCard

        public void setIfPlayerGetsCard(boolean ifPossible)
        This method sets the boolean variable true if the player is eligible to get the card and false if not. Player is eligible if he has won at lease one territory during the attack phase.
        Parameters:
        ifPossible - : value to be set for the player's eligibility for winning a card
